revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DI-707P |revision=C1 |asin=B000086TLC |newegg=N82E16833127029 |est_release_date=09/2004 |is_manuf=No |manuf=AMIT |manuf_model=HiP-400E |manuf_rev=(DLK001) |type=router, print server |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=D-Link |cpu1_model=DL7150 |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model= |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Parallel Port (DB-25) |expansion_lpt_num=1 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Infineon |sw_model=ADM6999 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=7 |wan_ports=1 |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|7-Ports Broadband Router Plus Print Server}} :[http://www.dlink.com/al/sq/support/product/di-707p-7-port-broadband-router-plus-print-server Support page] *1x 10/100Mbps WAN Ports *7x 10/100Mbps LAN Ports Note: Similar to the DI-704P model, with 3 more LAN ports. {{See also|SMC SMC7004AWBR v1|AMIT|D-Link}} *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/d-link-di-707p-7-port-broadband-router-with-a-built-89 ''D-Link DI-707P'' Spec. on '''SpeedGuide'''] ===Firmware=== *DI-604/704P/707P Firmware Release - Note Firmware: [http://www.dlinktw.com.tw/temp/dk2Support_Firmware/167/release_notes.pdf v3.11] :Hardware: Dx/Fx for DI-604 and Cx/Dx for DI-704P/DI-707P :Support DL7150/DL7300 CPU, Switch chip DL1005/IP175C :[[ADMtek]] ([[Infineon]]) ADM6999 - 8-ports FE (10/100) switch ===See also=== :;[https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_models&manufacturer_id=3 D-Link Models] *[[D-Link DI-604]] (UP) *[[D-Link DI-604 rev D1]]/D2 • [http://www.szetszedtem.hu/342dlink-604/router.htm PCB images] *[[D-Link DI-604 rev F1]]/F4 *[[D-Link DI-704P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=30 WP] *[[D-Link DI-707P rev C1]]/C2 (A1, B1, B2, B3) • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=31 WP] *[[D-Link DI-704UP]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=161 WP] *[[D-Link DI-713P rev A1]] • *[[D-Link DI-714P+ rev B1]] • *[[D-Link DI-714P+]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=34 WP] *[[D-Link DI-724P+]] • [https://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=162 WP] ==Images== File:D-Link DI-707Pa.jpg|D-Link DI-707P [[Has images::retail| ]] ---- C1 B1 ---- [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
